EmailTemplate.description: This email is sent at the point of submission,when the form is submitted and case is created in Salesforce
EmailTemplate.name: OLCNInitialNotificationToCASTeam
EmailTemplate.subject: REF NO. {!Case.CaseNumber} A new case has been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear CAS team,
You have a new online claim notification.
Reference Number
{!Case.CaseNumber}
Please match the CTP insurer within one working day.
If you are unable to match, please call the contact person.
Click to open the case
{!Case.Link}
